name: PraeBot
description: PraeBot - hardcorish platformer simulator in real time. Without registration. Or other MMS stuff. Do you have nerves of steel? Well, we’ll check that. This game will make you regret your existence.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: 1GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics HD DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Processor: i9-9990X Memory: 256 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Tesla P100 16GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 100 MB available space
